name: Notice.AAA6.MediationUnsuccessfulWithoutUploadDocuments.TrackChange.CARM.Claimant
titleEn: You are no longer required to submit documents relating to mediation non-attendance
titleCy: Nid yw'n ofynnol bellach i chi gyflwyno dogfennau sy'n ymwneud 창 pheidio 창 mynychu cyfryngu
descriptionEn: A judge has reviewed your case and you are no longer required to submit documents relating to non-attendance of a mediation appointment. There will be no penalties issued for your non-attendance.
descriptionCy: Mae barnwr wedi adolygu eich achos ac nid yw'n ofynnol i chi gyflwyno dogfennau bellach yn ymwneud 창 pheidio 창 mynychu apwyntiad cyfryngu. Ni fydd unrhyw gosbau yn cael eu gosod am eich diffyg presenoldeb.
